thread.title: Ground News - A Kurdish mu'tamar died in Mecca due to a heart attack
thread.title_full: Ground News - A Kurdish mu'tamar died in Mecca due to a heart attack

author: شفق نيوز
title: Ground News - A Kurdish mu'tamar died in Mecca due to a heart attack
text:
Summary by شفق نيوز Shafaq News/The Directorate of Hajj and Umrah in the Kurdistan Region announced on Sunday the death of a Kurdish mu'amrah in the holy city of Mecca in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. In a statement received by Shafaq News Agency, the Directorate said that “a Kurdish mu'tamar died this morning in Mecca after suffering a heart attack.” She added that “Mu'amrah is called Khalid Ahmed. He is a native of Penguin district in Sulaymaniyah governorate, whe… Share menu More
